document.full_text: new york city's firefighting staff would fall to the lowest number since 1980 while its police force would be cut back to its 1992 roster under mayor michael bloomberg's austere budget plan, a report said friday.
document.title: nyc fire, police forces may fall to decade lows
lines_and_colors: new york city's firefighting staff would fall to the lowest number since 1980 while its police force would be cut back to its 1992 roster under mayor michael bloomberg's austere budget plan, a report said friday.
